title: Sarah Stanbury teaches in the English Department at the College of the Holy Cross. She is the author of Seeing the Gawain- Poet, coeditor of Feminist Approaches to the Body in Medieval Literature and, most recently, with Virginia Raguin, of Women's Space: Patronage, Place and Gender in the Medieval Church
Robert S. Sturges is University Research Professor of English at the University of New Orleans
Chaucer's Pardoner and Gender Theory: Bodies c.ifDiscourse (2000); and Dialogue and Deviance: Male-Male Desire in the Dialogue Genre
